judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
The former Mr. Chief Justice Bell and the late Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the decision of this case.

opinions.text:
Opinion
pee Curiam,
Order affirmed. The sentence of death is vacated and appellant is sentenced to life imprisonment.
The former Mr. Chief Justice Bell and the late Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: pee Curiam,

attorneys: Nicholas B. Piama, Assistant District Attorney, and Howard R. Berninger, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Senk, Appellant.
Submitted May 26, 1969.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Gailey C. Keller, for appellant.
Nicholas B. Piama, Assistant District Attorney, and Howard R. Berninger, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
November 17, 1972:
